title: My Husband Refuses To Work as a Team With Me (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Rachel Cruze discuss:

When a spouse refuses to work with you on money,

Taking a hardship withdraw from retirement,

Getting ahead on a small business.


Support Our Sponsor:

DreamCloud
